creditline: Gift from the estate of James Clarence Fletcher
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: medium blue; embroidered overall with primarily salmon-colored flowers and moths/butterflies; black trim embroidered in white and shades of blue with flowers and butterflies; blue lining; inside of cuffs are salmon-colored silk embroidered with similar flowers and insects and trimmed with ribbon
title: Woman's unofficial informal robe
